studyMetadata.title: Super resolution image evaluation for cancer detection
studyMetadata.description: This is a study to evaluate the effectiveness of super resolution images for cancer detection.

uiConfig.studyEndMsg: **Thank you for your participation. Your responses have been recorded. If you have any questions feel free to contact us at [ishratjahan.eliza@utah.edu](mailto:ishratjahan.eliza@utah.edu)**

super.instruction: Please zoom-in, pan, zoom-out as needed before answering the questions:

response.secondaryText: Consider cellular abnormalities, tissue organization, and structural changes
response.prompt: Which image more accurately represents detailed pathological features?

response.secondaryText: Consider nuclear details, membrane boundaries, and cytoplasmic features
response.prompt: Which image helps you to distinguish individual cellular structures better?

response.secondaryText: Consider whether any artifacts or artificial patterns are present that are not natural
response.prompt: Which image better represents informative tissue textures?

response.secondaryText: Consider whether any artifacts or artificial patterns are present that are not natural
response.prompt: Which image, if any, reports false tissue textures?

response.secondaryText: Consider the transitions between cellular structures
response.prompt: Which image better defines the bundaries between tissue regions?

response.secondaryText: Consider the clarity and usefulness of details at higher magnification
response.prompt: Which image maintains better zooming quality?
Please provide any additional comments or rationale behind choosing your answers.
Do you consent to the study and wish to continue?
To what extent do the super-resolution images make you confident in detecting cancerous regions?
What specific features or details are more visible in the super-resolution image compared to the original?
Are there any artifacts or distortions in the super-resolution image that could potentially interfere with detection?
Which image would you prefer to use in practice?
Please write in detail the rationale behind your choice in question 4?

prompt: Which image better represents informative tissue textures?
